name: Fingers Inc.
description: '''Fingers Inc.''' was an American music group hailing from [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]], comprising the producer [[Larry Heard]] and vocalists [[Robert Owens (musician)|Robert Owens]] and [https://www.discogs.com/artist/27870-Ron-Wilson Ron Wilson]. Renowned for their pioneering deep house records, they emerged in the mid-1980s, notably with the release of the 1988 album '[[Another Side (Fingers Inc. album)|Another Side]]' and hit singles like "[[Mystery of Love (Larry Heard song)|Mystery Of Love]]" and the iconic "[[Can You Feel It (Larry Heard song)|Can You Feel It]]?".  [[AllMusic]] called it the "top early [[Chicago house]] group".
